cause.description:
We serve God and partner with His people to extend His kingdom cross-culturally on campus and around the world.
In response to God's love, grace and truth: The Purpose of InterVarsity Christian Fellowship/USA is to establish and advance at colleges and universities witnessing communities of students and faculty who follow Jesus as Savior and Lord: growing in love for God, God's Word, God's people of every ethnicity and culture and God's purposes in the world.
1. Scripture: We encounter the living God through scripture and are transformed by the Holy Spirit as we read, study, teach and obey His Word.
2. Prayer: We express our faith, love and dependence on God through lives of prayer and worship.
3. Spiritual Formation: We cultivate intimacy with God and growth in Christ-like character through personal and corporate spiritual disciplines, empowered by the Spirit.
4. Community: We promote authentic relationships and redemptive communities marked by God's grace and truth.
5. Discipleship of the mind: We engage in learning and thoughtful Biblical reflection in every area of life.
6. Leadership Development: We develop women and men to serve as leaders at every level of InterVarsity and ultimately for the Kingdom of God, honoring God's gifts and calling in them.
cause.mission: Be a redeeming influence among the people, ideas, and structures at our schools.
cause.name: My Life Has Been Touched By InterVarsity Christian Fellowship
